article_title: Day in Photos: Mining Explosion in Bosnia, IFA 2014, Ebola in Liberia and More
article_text:
x of x President Barack Obama is welcomed by Britain's Prince Charles at a reception at the Celtic Manor Thursday night during NATO Summit 2014. Charles Dharapak/AP

x of x A Bosnian coal miner is helped by friends and relatives Friday as he exits the Raspotocje mine in Zenica, Bosnia, where a gas explosion knocked out several tunnels and reportedly killed five miners. Elvis Barukcic/AFP/Getty Images

x of x Artisans from the Indian state of Kolkata prepare idols of Hindu gods and goddesses for the upcoming Durga Puja festival in Allahabad, India, on Friday. Rajesh Kumar Singh/AP

x of x Attendees wave their dinner napkins at a Diner en Blanc, or "Dinner in White", along the banks of the Anacostia River in The Yards Park on Thursday in Washington, D.C. The pop-up event drew more than 1,000 couples dressed elegantly for a gourmet picnic dinner that included stemware, flatware and china. Win McNamee/Getty Images

x of x A visitor tries out a Samsung Gear S smart watch at the Samsung stand at the 2014 IFA electronics trade show Friday in Berlin. Sean Gallup/Getty Images

x of x A health worker sprays a man suspected of dying from Ebola with disinfectant chemicals in Monrovia, Liberia, on Sept. 4. Abbas Dulleh/AP

x of x A man walks past a flooded neighborhood Friday in Srinagar, India, where overwhelmed local authorities have requested help from federal rescue officials as rain continues to fall. Mukhtar Khan/AP

x of x A military helicopter flies over government supporters performing Friday prayers during a rally against Houthi Shiite rebels on Friday in Sanaa, Yemen. Hani Mohammed/AP

x of x Flowers surround Joan Rivers' star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame in Los Angeles Thursday. Damian Dovarganes/AP

article_metadata.title: Day in Photos: Mining Explosion in Bosnia, IFA 2014, Ebola in Liberia and More

og.description: Mining explosion kills five in Bosnia, IFA 2014, Ebola outbreak in Liberia and more.
